parties: John BUGGS, Appellant v. STATE OFFICIALS, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al. Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Counsel For Jeffery A. Beard, Shirley Moore, John S. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of March, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
